page.title: 06TYPICAL DAY IN LIFE OF CHILD
page.content: I get up at 8 o'clock and do some exercises until quarter past. Then I have my breakfast and go to school. School starts and 9 o'clock and stops for lunch at half past twelve. I normallu go home for lunch. My school is only a few hundred meters away from my home so I have plenty of time. At twenty five to two the bell rings and shool is in until twenty past three. I go home and get changed to play with my pals. We normally play at the grassy piece of land near my home. Later it is time for tea. At about a quarter past six I play in my bedroom then watch television. After supper I go to bed and the light goes off about quarter past nine.
